segments.text: Thank you for seeing me . Did you look over my letter and resume ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Quite good . Perhaps you're very interested in the social benefits .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I think it is possible more important than the salary .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? We would like to start you off at 2,000 yuan a month , excluding bonus and overtime pay .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good , about the essential living conditions ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , we'll supply you with an apartment of a bedroom and a living room .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . I'm a female . Are there any special benefits for me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , in our company , the women have a two-week vacation a year , besides this , if you are a married woman , maternity leave for some months is permitted .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think it is very necessary for us . I wonder whether I am on holiday with payment every year .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , you have a paid month holiday every year .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Right . How about the unemployment compensation and the retirement pension ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , we are only responsible for the retirement pension . About the unemployment compensation , this will be given by the government .
segments.speaker: S2
